:memo: What’s Changed

  • Mail: Fix value checks (#2169) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.81.0 to 1.82.0 (#2168) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rdoc from 6.6.3.1 to 6.7.0 (#2167) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.932.0 to 1.933.0 (#2166) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump minitest from 5.23.0 to 5.23.1 (#2164) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.931.0 to 1.932.0 (#2163) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump racc from 1.7.3 to 1.8.0 (#2161) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack-timeout from 0.6.3 to 0.7.0 (#2160) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rb-inotify from 0.10.1 to 0.11.1 (#2155) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.930.0 to 1.931.0 (#2154) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.929.0 to 1.930.0 (#2153) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rexml from 3.2.6 to 3.2.8 (#2150) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.40.14

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.1: The War Against the Bots
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

The new user sign up confirmation process now requires a click through. This is done so that URL scanners don't inadvertently confirm accounts.

Also now included is an example setup of running Password Pusher with Caddy for simple SSL hosting.

:rocket: Features

  • User Confirmation: Add click-through step (#2199) @pglombardo
  • Latest Language Strings (#2200) @pglombardo
  • Launch Password Pusher with Let's Encrypt SSL/TLS Certificates (#2192) @pglombardo
  • Caddy: Add Secure Cookies Policy (#2201) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.4.11 to 0.4.12 (#2194) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-cloud-storage from 1.51.0 to 1.52.0 (#2197) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump ffi from 1.16.3 to 1.17.0 (#2196) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump mini_portile2 from 2.8.6 to 2.8.7 (#2195) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.38.0 to 0.39.0 (#2193) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush
